name: Black Diamond Raven Ultra Ice Axe
description: Ski-mountaineers and weight-wary climbers and hikers will appreciate this compact axe. Its redesigned steel head offers better ergonomics and purchase in moderate alpine ice and snow.Aluminum shaft.Axe head is investment-cast stainless steel. Large hole accommodates a carabiner.45-degree spike angle penetrates hard snow. Durable steel won't get chewed up on rock.Moderately aggressive B-rated pick.CEN-B certified.
